import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { useIntersectionObserver } from 'react-intersection-observer-hook'; import Link from 'next/link' import {MainLayout} from '../components/templates/layouts' import {Navigation} from '../components/molecules' import {View, Text, Image, Button} from '../components/atoms' import knobData from "./index.knobs.json"; const {menus} = knobData.data; const App = React.forwardRef(() => { const [open,setOpen] = useState(false) const [overlay, setOverlay] = useState(false) const [ref, { entry }] = useIntersectionObserver(); const isVisible = entry && entry.isIntersecting; useEffect(() => { console.log(`The component is ${isVisible ? "visible" : "not visible"}.`) },[isVisible]) const openMenu = () => { setOpen(true) setOverlay(true) document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden'; } const closeMenu = () => { setOpen(false) setOverlay(false) document.body.style.overflow = 'unset'; } return ( Good Morning 21 April 2020 My Products My Related Projects Issues Stories navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.location.href)}> “Copy Link to Clipboard”
